name: Dungeon Cookery
description:
Explore the dark dungeon and search for ingredients. Bring them back to the kitchen and slice them up! Add the ingredients to the magic and watch the magic turn them into delectable dishes! Can you discover all the dishes currently in the game?

Note: the executable name for the downloadable game is Nightmare. That is the correct file. It was the original name for the game and I could not change it. My bad.

This game was made for JamCraft3. This is also my first uploaded game. Thank you for looking at my game!
